content.en: Cloud optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address the challenges of load imbalance and task scheduling in cloud computing. These algorithms, such as Min-Max, MCC, MEMAX, and CMMN, aim to improve the utilization rate, execution time, makespan, and cloud utilization. By optimizing task scheduling and resource allocation, these algorithms enhance system performance, reduce completion time, and improve workload balance and quality of service in cloud environments.
content.da: Skyoptimering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at imødegå udfordringerne ved belastningsubalance og opgaveplanlægning i cloud computing. Disse algoritmer, såsom Min-Max, MCC, MEMAX og CMMN, sigter mod at forbedre udnyttelsesgraden, udførelsestiden, makespan og skyudnyttelsen. Ved at optimere opgaveplanlægning og ressourceallokering forbedrer disse algoritmer systemets ydeevne, reducerer gennemførelsestiden og forbedrer arbejdsbyrdebalancen og kvaliteten af service i cloud-miljøer.
